page.title: 09Day in The Life of a Family
page.content: The day starts noisily at about 7am. with the post,children,a dog and a cat landing simultaneously on our bed.The radio news is absorbed between bathing and dressing,and breakfast is simply toast or cereal and coffee. Sunday breakfast is the only leisurely start to a day,excepting weekends when father is working. I take 'phone calls from the surgery from 8am. onwards.This may include sorting out urgent problems or passing messages;frequently with a mouthful of toast!I try to be at the surgery by 8:45 for the patients "Phone In" but this is often prevented by requests for home visits before surgery.My wife drives or walks the children to school or,if pressed just points them in the right direction.
